name: ChatGPT
description: Powerful conversational AI model developed by OpenAI, capable of answering questions, creating content, assisting with programming, and more

name: Midjourney
description: AI art and image generation tool that creates high-quality artwork from text descriptions

name: DALL-E
description: OpenAI's AI image generation system that creates realistic images from text descriptions

name: Notion AI
description: AI assistant integrated into Notion that helps users write, edit, summarize, and translate content

name: Jasper
description: AI content creation platform that helps marketing teams and content creators quickly generate high-quality content

name: Synthesia
description: AI video generation platform that creates professional video content from text input

name: Descript
description: AI-powered audio and video editing tool offering transcription, editing, and synthesis capabilities

name: GitHub Copilot
description: AI programming assistant that provides code suggestions based on comments and existing code

name: Otter.ai
description: AI meeting assistant and transcription tool that can record and summarize meeting content in real-time

name: Grammarly
description: AI writing assistant that provides grammar checking, spell correction, and writing suggestions

name: Claude
description: Conversational AI assistant developed by Anthropic, focused on safety and helpfulness

name: Stable Diffusion
description: Open-source AI image generation model capable of creating images in various styles
